name: Cube 3D Random Play
description:
Cube3D is a 3-D combination intellectual puzzle game.
You can start a new game by presssing "Help - Restart", it will generate a random different colors of cube every time.
Base on goo-gle doodle.

How to play:
-Swipe outside the cube to rotate it.
-Swipe inside to twist the cube.
-When all same colour in one face,you win!

Have fun!
